text: onon, ki imon meovarand ʙa ƣajʙ, ki hissijotu aqlason onro dark namekunad, magar ʙa tariqi vahje, ki Alloh ʙa rasulonas mefiristad. (Imon in kalimaest, ki darʙar megirad iqror kardani ʙa Alloh, maloikaho, kitoʙho, rasulon, ruzi oxirat va taqdiri neki va ʙadiro va niz iqror kardani ʙo zaʙon va amal kardan ʙo dil, zaʙon va cavoreh ast) va onon ʙinoʙar tasdiqason ʙa ƣajʙ namozro dar vaqtas muvofiqi sari'ati Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam ado menamojand va az on ci ruzijason dodaem, nafaqa medihand (nafaqai vociʙi; monandi zakot, nafaqai zanu farzand... va nafaqai mustahaʙi; monandi hamai korhoi xajr)
